results.title: Metformin alleviates osteoarthritis in mice by inhibiting chondrocyte ferroptosis and improving subchondral osteosclerosis and angiogenesis
results.text_hl: These results indicated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ may alleviate subchondral @<m>DISEASE_Osteosclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010026 @@@osteosclerosis@@@ in DMM @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.
